page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: {The area we surveyed includes the {seafront at Brighton and most of the {town centre. Brighton is a seaside {towncontaining many areas of historic {importance.The town centre is an {amalgam of commerce and residential {buildings.Along the seafront there are {two impressive piers.Although mainly a {tourist centre Brighton has also {developed a strong commercial side to {its activities.The population of our {block has grown greatly since the {town became a tourist {attraction.Party Conferences are held {in Brighton each year which provide {agreat opportunity for businesses in {Brighton and for terrorists. Graham {Greene made the area famous with his {novel Brighton Rock. { }
